idea:
Devidayal Solar Solutions' focus is on developing and selling solutions in the renewable energy space. The company will collaborate with others and leverage on technology to conceive and implement projects wherein renewable energy becomes an enabler to improve the lives of the people in a sustainable manner. The organization will be run as a commercial enterprise with internal accruals used to achieve its vision.


Our flagship product is an award winning solar off-grid refrigerator.  We also have a full range of high efficiency BLDC solar fans, integrated all-in-one street lights, PWM smart solar charge controllers, quality assured solar lamps & lanterns and a full range of 12V solar modules.
name: DEVIDAYAL SOLAR SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are starting a chain outlet on Pan India basis of indian Tea stall having the variety of more than 30 types of tea .After making of research over more than 2 years with expertise of cook , tea manufacturer , caters and other professionals ,now we have every tea flavor with a unique taste .For each tea there will be different tea leaf of different countries and different states, which again be prepared and premixed by expertise with many secret ingredients hence all franchise have not yo worry about any compitition, and copy of our formula is again impossible .So if you are interested in becoming our franchise partner can contact on -9820060465 or on -cagouri@gmail.com
